content:
# The error indicates that we no longer have any iron ore in our inventory to insert into the furnace. 
# This means we need to go back and harvest more iron ore before we can smelt it into iron plates.

# 1. Let's locate the nearest iron ore patch again.
iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)

# 2. Move to the iron ore patch and harvest another 10 iron ore.
move_to(iron_position)
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)

# 3. After harvesting, we can check the inventory to confirm we have the iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
